title: Hero MotoCorp commences bookings for next lot of XPulse 200 4 Valve
description: Priced at Rs 1,30,150 (ex-showroom - Delhi), the motorcycle can be booked on the company's online sales platform -- eSHOP -- by making an advance payment of Rs 10,000, Hero MotoCorp said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
